abstract: Aurora James, Rio Uribe and Jonathan Simkhai receive young designers award at annual CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund.
lead_paragraph: In front of an audience that included Demi Moore and Zendaya, Aurora James, Rio Uribe and Jonathan Simkhai received the young designer award, which will give them a bigger platform for their work.

headline.main: Anna Wintour, Prizes and Potpie at CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund Dinner
headline.print_headline: Fashion’s Night for Prizes and Potpies

snippet: In front of an audience that included Demi Moore and Zendaya, Aurora James, Rio Uribe and Jonathan Simkhai received the young designer award, which will give them a bigger platform for their work.

keywords.value: Council of Fashion Designers of America
